outcome: /JUDGMENT IN CMP 5873/2018 of J.M.F.C. ,NEDUMKANDOM O.R. NO. 25/2018 OF Forest Range Office , Devikulam PETITIONER/S: RAJESH CHANDRAN s/o RAMACHANDRAN, AGED 29 YEARS, ALUMMOOTTIL HOUSE, PETHOTTY KARA,
full_text: See opie IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM 2019/KER/931 PRESENT THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE B.SUDHEENDRA KUMAR TUESDAY ,THE O8TH DAY OF JANUARY 2019 / 18TH POUSHA, 1940 Cr1.MC.No. 8382 of 2018 AGAINST THE ORDER/JUDGMENT IN CMP 5873/2018 of J.M.F.C. ,NEDUMKANDOM O.R. NO. 25/2018 OF Forest Range Office , Devikulam PETITIONER/S: RAJESH CHANDRAN s/o RAMACHANDRAN, AGED 29 YEARS, ALUMMOOTTIL HOUSE, PETHOTTY KARA, SANTHANPARA VILLAGE, IDUKKI DISTRICT. BY ADV. SMT.CAROLIN SINDHU VAZ RESPONDENT/S: STATE OF KERALA REPRESENTED BY THE PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM 682 031 BY SPECIAL GOVERNMENT PLEADER FOREST, SRI RAVIKRISHNAN THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 08.01.2019, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: 2019/KER/931 Cr1.MC.No. 8382 of 2018 2 ORDER The revision petitioner is the petitioner in C.M.P.No.5873/2018, on the files of the court below. The revision petitioner filed the above said C.M.P under Section 451 CrPC. praying for releasing the vehicle bearing no. KL 29 D 7947 to the interim custody of the petitioner The court below as per Annexure AZ order dismissed the said petition, against which this Crl.M.C. has been filed. 2. Heard. 3. When this matter has been taken up for hearing, the learned Public Prosecutor has submitted that the vehicle had been already confiscated under the Saas) 2019/KER/931 Cr1.MC.No. 8382 of 2018 3 provisions of the Kerala Forest Act. Since the vehicle had been already confiscated by the authorised officer, Annexure A2 order dismissing the petition filed by the petitioner under Section 451 CrPC. does not warrant any interference by this Court. In the result, this Crl.M.C stands dismissed. However, this order will not stand in the way of the petitioner in challenging the order of confiscation, in accordance with law. Sd/- B.SUDHEENDRA KUMAR RK/08.01.2019 JUDGE HfTRUE COPY// PA TO JUDGE aes Op 2019/KER/931 Cr1l.MC.No. 8382 of 2018 4 APPENDIX PETITIONER'S/S EXHIBITS: ANNEXURE-A1 TRUE COPY OF THE FORM 1 REPORT DATED 15.09.2018 ISSUED BY FOREST RANGE OFFICER DEVIKULAM ANNEXURE-A2 CERTIFIED COPY OF THE ORDER DATED 15.11.2018 OF THE JUDICIAL FIRST CLASS MAGISTRATE'S COURT, NDUMKANDOM IN C.M.P.NO.5873/18 IN O.R.25/18 FOREST RANGE OFFICE DEVIKULAM REGISTERED AS CRIME NO.331/2018 OF SHANTANPARA POLICE STATION ANNEXURE-A3 TRUE COPY OF THE OBJECTION DATED 09.10.2018 OF THE FOREST RANGE OFFICER DEVIKULAM FILED BEFORE JFCM NEDUMKANDOM RESPONDENT'S/S EXHIBITS :NiL //TRUE CoPY// PA TO JUDGE
